name: Mad Factory - The Escape
description:
◼︎ Story:

One day, a box awoke in a dark factory…
And saw all the other boxes being transported on a conveyor.
‘The Box’ also followed the path, but a massive press blocks its way.
Could ‘The Box’ make its way out of the factory?

◼︎ Mad Factory - The Escape:

In order for ‘The Box’ to escape the factory, you need to roll ‘The Box’ to seek a specific color, just like a Rubik’s Cube, and fake screening sensors of the conveyer.
Having a hard time solving cube puzzles? Don’t worry from now on!
As you are passing through various obstacles and enjoying the game, you will naturally learn how to roll the cube inside of your brain, boosting your spatial perception ability.

If you are looking for…
A unique game,
A new game format,
A game you can learn from,
A game with a classy visual and music,

Play Mad Factory!
